text: kya tumane un logon ko nahin dekha jo hazaaron kee sankhya mein hone par bhee mrtyu ke bhay se apane ghar-baar chhodakar nikale the? to allaah ne unase kaha, "mrtyu praay ho jao tum." phir usane unhen jeevan pradaan kiya. allaah to logon ke lie udaar anugraahee hai, kintu adhikatar log krtagyata nahin dikhalaate
